A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So much squandered potential and opportunity. Instead\, we got an incoherent mashup of gratuitous CGI scenes stitched together with poorly developed character arcs\, reams of throwaway dialogue\, and gaping plot holes. I get that TLJ tried to be subversive\, but it failed pretty spectacularly in execution. It only rates a full star out of respect for the franchise legacy\, and it did keep me in my seat (grudgingly) till the end.
